action.action-desc: Mr. McGuire introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of Homeland Security establish a publicly avaiable web page on the website of the Department of Homeland Security to permit individuals to view active border wall construction and progress, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Border Wall Status Act.

section.header: Website to view active border wall construction and progress
section.text: The Secretary of Homeland Security shall take such actions as may be necessary to establish a publicly available web page on the website of the Department of Homeland Security to permit individuals to view active border wall construction and progress.
